text: Va kofiron guftand: «Mo hargiz, na ʙa in Qur'on imon meovarem va na ʙa kitoʙhoi peş az on (Tavrot, Inçil va Zaʙur)!» Agar ʙuʙinī ej Rasul, on rūz, ki sitamkoronro ʙaroi hisoʙrasī ʙa peşgohi Parvardigoraşon nigoh dorand, har kas gunohi xud ʙa gardani digare andozad. Notavonon ʙa qudratmandon gūjand: «Agar şumo nameʙuded, mo ʙa Allohu rasulaş imon ovarda ʙudem»
